document_data.name: Detention Center
document_data.mainbody: The '''Detention Center''' was a jail located in the city of [[Zhentil Keep]] during the midâ€“14{{th}} century [[DR]] before that city's destruction.
document_data.Location: The Detention Center was located in Zhentil Keep's [[Zhentil Keep/Inner Quarter|Inner Quarter]] on [[Gold Street]] across from the [[High Hall (Zhentil Keep)|High Hall]].
document_data.Activities: Anyone arrested within Zhentil Keep, regardless of the validity of the charges brought against them, was required to spend at least one night in the Detention Center before being brought before the judicial administrator.
